name: Mun (Dul2Work)
description:
Mun is a new puzzle game we have deleveloped where, through one mechanic, you will have to dodge  enemies and get to the door in order to scape.

Every level presents a new challenge. Plan your strategy. Every move counts...

We will publish in Android and Apple soon! 

If you like the game stay tuned for the mobile version along with new content!
